Text.content:
Sometimes, contents are arranged manually on a website, sometimes contents are published in the form of dynamic lists with pagination, filtering and sorting, e.g., all articles on a certain topic that have been published in the last week.

Content lists in OpenCms are realized via so called list configurations. The results of such list configurations can either be shown on websites and now also in mobile applications.

Application developers have the possibility to retrieve content lists configured by editorial teams via the JSON API and to dynamically change filter and sort criteria using the request parameters.
